propositions.text: Emotional conflict and personal struggle in relationships
Expression of regret and longing for appreciation
Frustration over lack of mutual understanding
Societal and cultural constraints on gender roles
Desire for independence and breaking norms
Personal growth and pursuit of education
Struggle with societal pressure against education
Tension between personal desires and family obligations
Impact of parental expectations on life choices

concepts.name: Love
concepts.context: Emotional expressions of longing and conflict in relationships

concepts.name: Family

concepts.name: Independence
concepts.context: Desire to break free from societal and familial constraints

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured as a narrative with interwoven personal reflections, dialogues, and cultural critiques, focusing on emotional and societal conflicts.
